sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OGSequencingUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>OGSequencingUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var OGSequencingUtil = Class.create();
OGSequencingUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    generateSequence: function() {
        var errMsg = gs.getMessage('Sequence Generation Failed');
        var orderGuideId = this.getParameter('guide_id');
        var processName = this.getParameter('process_name');
        var sequence = new sn_sc.OrderGuideSequencing(orderGuideId).generateSequence(processName);
        if (sequence.errMsg) {
            gs.addErrorMessage(sequence.errMsg);
            return '';
        } else if (sequence.url && sequence.process) {
            return sequence.url;
        }
    },

    type: 'OGSequencingUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-06 18:29:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>795f9d3773923010ae42d31ee2f6a7da</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OGSequencingUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Order Guide Sequential Fulfillment" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.order_guide_sequencing">54dd193447720210cd4e1ce4316d430c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_795f9d3773923010ae42d31ee2f6a7da</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-16 16:39:14</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
